product_name: Whispbar WB200 Rooftop Fork Bike Mount
long_description: Made to mount easily to the Whispbar system by Yakima, the WB200 bike mount offers sleek aerodynamic styling and a fork mount that works with both standard and thru-axle forks, no adapter needed. Curved, polished aluminum design is made to integrate seamlessly with the roof rack, carrying your road or mountain bikes in sporty, yet refined style. The new SmartMount(TM) fork mount design secures almost any size bike, working with both standard 9mm axles and 15mm thru-axle forks. Rear wheel cradle slides forward and back to accommodate different sizes of bikes. QuickDock(TM) mounting system works with the Whispbar rack system (sold separately) for quick and easy installation; includes adapter to use with other Yakima crossbars. Integrated Lock System features just one lock that secures your bike to the mount and the mount to the roof rack.
short_description: Made to mount easily to the Whispbar system by Yakima, the WB200 bike mount offers sleek aerodynamic styling and a fork mount that works with both standard and thru-axle forks, no adapter needed.
